name: Gatástrofe (gumegasonic)
description:
In the game, you are Mel, a cat detective who seeks to retrieve the skeins of the cats from the Hotel Felino, controlled by the bad cat, Frida, defeat her henchmen on your way to the top floor, where she controls everything and everyone in the hotel.

The game contains multiple levels and special levels, that rewards you with new weapons and water bombs. Create strategies and manage your resources to go trough every floor of the hotel, up to Frida.

Instructions:

WASD -> movimentation + jump

Mouse -> aim

LMB(left mouse button) -> fire

RMB(right mouse button) -> blue bomb (area damage)

Esc -> menu
